NAME: clear
OPTIONS_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount you want to clear. (0 for all)
OPTIONS_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user you want to clear the messsages of. (0 for all)
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to clean up a channel's messages.
CANCELED: The deletion of all messages from the channel has been canceled.
CONFIRM_ALL: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to delete all messages from the channel, so the channel will be deleted and cloned. Click the confirm button to confirm.
TIMEOUT: The time is up, you have not validated that you want to delete all the messages from the channel.
SUCCESS_ALL: The channel has been cleaned up successfully.
SYSTEM: Cannot purge all messages from the channel as it is an important system channel.
SUCCESS_USER: **{{amount}}** messages from **{{name}}** have been successfully deleted.
